instructionOptions.instruction: It is essential to be aware of certain terms and definitions related to food safety. Click a term on the left and match it with its meaning on the right.

couple.definition: The presence or introduction of something harmful (a hazard) or objectionable in food
Measures and conditions to ensure that food is fit to eat by controlling hazards and protecting it from harmful substances
An acute illness caused by eating contaminated or poisonous food
Hazard Analysis Critical Control Point – a safety management system to identify and control hazards related to food safety
Anything in food with the potential to cause harm to consumers
Those people most at risk from food poisoning and most likely to die
Food that is free from contaminants and will not cause harm, injury or illness
